text.en: In the dharmadhātu palace of natural simplicity
Is the dharmakāya, Great Mother of the buddhas—to you I pray:
text.en-trans: chöku gyalwa yumchen la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me, so that all habitual patterns of the impure ālaya
text.en-trans: ma dak rangzhin künzhi bakchak tsok

text.en: May be realized as the dharmakāya of twofold purity!
In the spontaneously present land of unimpeded wisdom
text.en-trans: gakmé yeshe köpa lhün gyi drub

text.en: Is the sambhogakāya Vajravārāhī—to you I pray:
text.en-trans: longku dorjé pakmo la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me, so that karmic winds, ālaya, defiled mental consciousness and so forth
text.en-trans: lé lung künzhi namshé nyön yi sok

text.en: May be purified as the five poisons are realized as the five wisdoms!
text.en-trans: duk nga yeshe nga ru jingyi lob

text.en: In the palace of taming sentient beings with compassion
Is the nirmāṇakāya, Yeshe Tsogyal—to you I pray:
text.en-trans: tulku yeshe tsogyal la solwa deb

text.en: Bless me, so that momentary concepts and confusion may naturally vanish,
text.en-trans: lobur küntok trulpa rang sar zhik

text.en: And I may realize the enlightened mind of the Three Kāyas!
text.en-trans: ku sum gongpa ngöngyur jingyi lob

text.en: From now on, throughout all my lives to come,
text.en-trans: di né zung té tserab tamché du

text.en: May the Gurus and Ḍākinīs care for me with compassion!
May I fully engage with the sublime path of the Vajrayāna,
text.en-trans: dorjé tekpé lam chok rabtu nyé

text.en: And awaken into the primordial ground of Samantabhadra!
text.en-trans: kunzang dömé zhi la changchub shok
